messages.subject: Re:perfectionist
messages.msgSnippet: I don t know if this will help Mook.  My 6 yr dd gets frustrated with her art work too.  I ve pointed out to her that all the great artists produce lots of art
messages.messageBody:
I don't know if this will help Mook. My 6 yr dd gets frustrated with her
art work too. I've pointed out to her that all the great artists produce
lots of art that they don't like and that it takes lots of practice to
get good at something. This has helped a little.
Mary Ellen
Neglect Not The Gift That Is In Thee

>>> Mook is such a perfectionist. >>>
